column4: Can the user see which city is their capital city?
column5: 1. From the city view, click on City on the header.
column6: A list of the user's cities should be listed. "Capital City" should display under the capital and "You are here" will display on the city you are currently in.

column4: Can the user send reinforcements to other cities?
column5:
1. From the city view, click on City on the header.
2. Select a city from the city list
3. Click Reinforcements
column6: Reinforcements are sent to the selected city.

column4: Can the user view a second city?
column5:
1. From the city view, click on City on the header. 
2. Click on a city that is not the capital in the city list

column4: Can the user send reinforcements to a second city?
column5:
1. From the city view, click on City on the header. 
2. Select a city from the city list that is not the capital
3. Click Reinforcements
column6:
Reinforcements are sent to the selected city.
[I am yet to see this in gameplay yet]
